ABI Research | Oyster Bay, New York | On Site | Full Time / Part Time / Interns

IT Assistant - Oyster Bay, New York

We are looking for someone with a passion for technology who will help monitor and maintain existing systems, assist with new and ongoing IT projects, and provide outstanding support to employees.

Responsibilities include:

- Providing phone and technical support to local and remote employees

- Configuring desktops & laptops and installing required software

- Monitoring and maintaining servers and their associated services

- Diagnose and troubleshoot general network and hardware problems

Apply here for this position: https://www.abiresearch.com/careers/apply/65/
